minutes.title: Short Envisage Test
minutes.summary: The meeting between Craig Bonham and Nav Chirag focused on defining the specifications for a job role titled 'Head of Financial Reporting' based in Coventry. Key points included the minimum requirement of three years of post-qualification experience and basic qualification standards. The discussion aimed to confirm the job details and criteria for potential candidates.
action_points: Draft a detailed job description for the Head of Financial Reporting role, including responsibilities and criteria.
Circulate the finalized job specifications to relevant recruitment channels for candidate sourcing.
minutes.transcription:
[00:02] SPEAKER_00: This is a voice recording between Craig Bonham and Nav Chirag to discuss a job role in his team.
[00:14] SPEAKER_01: date is the 29th is it of January. So first question so Nav you're looking for a role what's the title?
[00:25] SPEAKER_02: Title is Head of Financial Reporting.
[00:28] SPEAKER_02: and the location.
[00:30] SPEAKER_01: The nation is Coventry.
[00:33] SPEAKER_01: How many years of experience are you looking forward to?
[00:37] SPEAKER_02: for at least three years post-qualification experience.  Yeah, okay.
[00:44] SPEAKER_01: And then what kind of qualifications are you looking for for the room?
[00:47] SPEAKER_02: qualifications minimum.
[00:48] SPEAKER_01: minimum
